description: Converts text a text to a file stream.

input.name: text
input.description: The contents of the file as text.

input.name: encoding
input.description:
The encoding of text. 
Supported encodings are: `ascii`, `base64`, `binary`, `hex`, `ucs2`, `utf8`, or `latin1` 
Defaults to `utf8`

input.name: name
input.description:
An optional file name. 
Defaults to `Unnamed`.

input.name: media type
input.description:
An optional MIME type describing the file content. 
Defaults to `text/plain`.

output.name: file
output.description: A file stream with specified text content.
